entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Temperature steady near minus 16.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Light snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 16. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
